page.title: 08Menu : Granville's, Stone
page.content:
There is a good selection of food at reasonable prices. First courses are priced from 40 pence to 1 pound 15 pence and include fruit juice, soup, melon, pate and prawn cocktail. Main courses cost from 1 pound 94 pence to 5 pounds.You may have quiche, beefburger, chilli con carne, fisherman's pie or sirloin steak. For dessert there is a choice of fruit crumble, meringue chantilly, cheese and biscuits or Granville's Glory at prices ranging from 60 pence to 1 pound.
("Granville's Glory" is named after Granville Leveson Gower, the First Earl of Granville whose grave is in St. Michael's Churchyard.)
